props.absolute: Applies **position: absolute** to the content element.
props.attach: Specifies which DOM element the overlay content should teleport to. Can be a direct element reference, querySelector string, or `true` to disable teleporting. Uses `body` by default.
props.closeOnBack: Closes the overlay content when the browser's back button is pressed or `$router.back()` is called, cancelling the original navigation. `persistent` overlays will cancel navigation and animate as if they were clicked outside instead of closing.
props.contained: Limits the size of the component and scrim to its offset parent. Implies `absolute` and `attach`.
props.zIndex: The z-index used for the component
props.noClickAnimation: Disables the bounce effect when clicking outside of the content element when using the persistent prop.
props.persistent: Clicking outside of the element or pressing esc key will not deactivate it.
props.scrim: Accepts true/false to enable background, and string to define color.

events.click:outside: Event that fires when clicking outside an active overlay.
